summary: A test suite that verifies the correct operation of a segmentation model integration by exercising its inference mask generation across a variety of input configurations—including single and multiple points, bounding boxes, and batched image sets—and confirming that the processing pipeline can be instantiated and torn down cleanly.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the segmentation model can be reliably incorporated into production systems, ensuring accurate mask outputs for diverse use‑cases and preventing regressions in model integration.
